api_list.api_description: Perform reverse geocoding to get address from coordinates.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the point to reverse geocode.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the point to reverse geocode.

api_list.api_description: Fetch postal codes associated with a given city and state in a specified country.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Country code such as 'US' for United States.

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: State code such as 'CA' for California.

required_parameters.name: city
required_parameters.description: The name of the city, such as 'Belmont'.

query: What is the address of my geographic coordinates? Also, list all postal codes in the city of my hometown.
